content.question: What does the article predict will happen in the future regarding Chinese New Year?

choices.label: Red envelopes will eventually disappear completely.
Sending text-message greetings will soon become out-of-date.
Traditional ways of celebrating the holiday will continue to change.
More families will begin to eat out at restaurants.

content.answer: Traditional ways of celebrating the holiday will continue to change.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
